statements: SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, spend FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, impressions FROM campaign_performance_data ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, spend FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY spend DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND impressions < 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks, impressions, spend FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, spend, start_date, end_date, campaign_id FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE spend > 5000 AND clicks < 1000 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, spend, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31' AND start_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE impressions >= 5000 OR clicks >= 1000 ORDER BY spend ASC, campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, cost FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE cost < 500;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance_data ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM campaign_optimization WHERE conversion_rate > 0.1;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, cost FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate, return_on_investment, budget FROM campaign_optimization WHERE return_on_investment > 0.5 ORDER BY budget ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, cost FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE impressions > 2000 AND cost < 500 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate, return_on_investment, budget FROM campaign_optimization WHERE budget > 500 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, cost FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE cost BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY impressions ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_name, spent FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, spent FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE spent BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT campaign_name, spent FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE impressions BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY spent DESC

SELECT campaign_name, impression_date, impression_count FROM campaign_performance_data JOIN campaign_impressions ON campaign_performance_data.campaign_id = campaign_impressions.campaign_id WHERE campaign_impressions.impression_count > 500 ORDER BY campaign_impressions.impression_date ASC

SELECT cim.click_date, cpd.campaign_name, cim.click_count FROM campaign_clicks AS cim JOIN campaign_impressions AS cimp ON cim.impression_id = cimp.impression_id JOIN campaign_performance_data AS cpd ON cimp.campaign_id = cpd.campaign_id WHERE cim.click_count > 50 ORDER BY cim.click_date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget, end_date, campaign_id FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM ad_groups;
SELECT ad_group_name, bid, target_audience FROM ad_groups;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, cost_per_click FROM ads;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND budget <= 10000;
SELECT ad_group_id, ad_group_name, bid FROM ad_groups WHERE bid BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY ad_group_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Display' AND cost_per_click > 1.5 ORDER BY ad_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, cost_per_click FROM ads JOIN ad_groups ON ads.ad_group_id = ad_groups.ad_group_id WHERE ad_groups.target_audience = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY cost_per_click ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT conversion_type, conversion_count FROM campaign_conversions ORDER BY conversion_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, cost, date FROM campaign_costs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, audience_segment, audience_size FROM campaign_audience WHERE audience_size < 5000;
SELECT id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_costs WHERE cost > 100.00 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, audience_segment, audience_size FROM campaign_audience WHERE audience_size BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_type, conversion_count FROM campaign_conversions WHERE conversion_count > 10 ORDER BY conversion_count DESC;
SELECT id, click_timestamp, device_type FROM campaign_clicks WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
